account_update_failed: An error occured, the account was not updated.
auth/cannot-delete-own-user-account: You cannot delete your own user account.
auth/email-already-exists: Email address is already in use by an existing user.
auth/email-already-in-use: An account already exists with this email address.
auth/invalid-email: The email address is not valid.
auth/requires-recent-login: Please login again and try again!
auth/too-many-requests: We have detected too many requests from your device. Take a break please!
auth/user-disabled: The user corresponding to this email address has been disabled.
auth/user-not-found: There is no user corresponding to this email address.
auth/weak-password: The password is not strong enough.

email_username_already_used: This email or username is already in use.
failed_to_send_email: Internal error! Unable to send mail. Try again later ...
four_char_long: Must be at least 4 characters long.
reset_password_success: Password reset successfully, please login again.
reset_pw_msg_sent: Please click on the link provided in the email we sent you to change your password.
reset_pw_token_invalid: Oops, it looks like the link has expired, try generating a new link.
